name: Tanaman Cushion Cover Only (56cmSq) - Aubergine/Red
description: Inspired by traditional Turkish kaftans, the Tanaman Cushion Cover is crafted from tussar silk, also known as "wild silk". This material is gathered locally from Indian forests where the silkworms dwell. Each cushion cover is handwoven and features a striking double-sided design; an aubergine ikat print on one side and block red on the other. Available in a variety of colours, this piece – designed by one of our co-founders, Sue Jones – brings bright, global appeal to your home.
